content: MOSCOW Oil services giant Schlumberger plans to buy a 45.65 percent stake in Eurasia Drilling for about $1.7 billion  potentially paving the way for it to become the sole owner of Russia's most active oilfield services company.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: Schlumberger to buy $1.7 billion stake in Russian oil driller

content: Schlumberger Ltd   the world's No.1 oilfield services provider  said it will cut 9 000 jobs  or about 7 percent of its workforce  as it focuses on controlling costs amid plummeting oil prices.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: Schlumberger to slash 9 000 jobs as oil prices plunge

content: * Indexes up: Dow 0.27 pct  S&P 0.5 pct  Nasdaq 0.56 pct   (Updates to early afternoon  changes byline)
name: Schlumberger NV
title: US STOCKS-Wall St rises after 5 down days; econ data  energy boost

content: Jan 16 Schlumberger Ltd  the world's No.1 oilfield services provider  said the oil price drop was likely to have a "significantly more dramatic" impact on North America than on the rest of the world.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: UPDATE 1-Schlumberger: International markets to fare better than N.America

content: * Has option to take full ownership   (Adds Schlumberger comments  detail  background)
name: Schlumberger NV
title: UPDATE 2-Schlumberger to buy $1.7 bln stake in Russian oil driller

content: Jan 15 Schlumberger Ltd  the world's No.1 oilfield services provider  said it will cut 9 000 jobs  or about 7 percent of its workforce  as it focuses on controlling costs amid plummeting oil prices.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: UPDATE 2-Schlumberger to slash 9 000 jobs as oil prices plunge

content: Jan 16 Schlumberger Ltd  the world's No.1 oilfield services provider  said the drop in oil prices was likely to have a bigger impact on activity and pricing in North America than in international markets  which is its stronghold.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: Schlumberger says weak oil prices to impact N. America activity most

content: Jan 15 Schlumberger Ltd  the world's No.1 oilfield services provider  reported a 6 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by efficiency improvements in North America and resilient drilling activity in the Middle East and Asia.
name: Schlumberger NV
title: Schlumberger revenue rises 6 pct
